channel.title: [562]Making it so other players can connect[562]
channel.description: Currently I am making a 562 server and have a router/box that Time Warner Cable has given me to get internet. The problem is the tutorials on how to connect players to your server are mostly about Linksys Routers. I have no clue if you can host players on a Router/Box that has came from Time Warner Cable. Also, I have tried to connect players to my server but it never works. So if you can answer this question please post it. Thanks!

item.title: [562]Making it so other players can connect[562]

item.description:
@Chiller wrote:

Currently I am making a 562 server and have a router/box that Time Warner Cable has given me to get internet. The problem is the tutorials on how to connect players to your server are mostly about Linksys Routers. I have no clue if you can host players on a Router/Box that has came from Time Warner Cable. Also, I have tried to connect players to my server but it never works. So if you can answer this question please post it. Thanks!
